bibl.title: Recent Identification of Greek Imports from Kom Firin. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: British Museum Expedition to Kom Firin (Western Delta), 2002. - Trading contacts between Egypt and Greece during the Late Period (sixth century B.C.) by the occurrence of Aegean transport amphorae.
bibl.seg: SMOLÁRIKOVÁ Kvéta, Recent Identification of Greek Imports from Kom Firin. Avec résumé en anglais.
